channel.title: Czar source help! Person's position doesent get updated on my screen
channel.description:
Ok so I know someone has to have a fix for this!
The source won't update players position meaning, if the person EX: swings across the monkey bars on my screen it shows him by me on 1 side but on his screen he's really on the other side... WTF????
Same thing with ::xteletome (It’s not a command problem) I can't use ::xteletome unless I log in after the person so meaning the person has to be on the server b4 me in order for me to use that command on him.
Another thing like I said if the person is let’s say 10 squares away from me and still visible to me and I use the ::xteletome command on them. On their screen they are on top of me but on my screen I still see them 10 squares away.
Please if someone can help me!!!

item.title: Czar source help! Person's position doesent get updated on my screen
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Thing is even when I download czar and I don’t modify it… It does the same thing??? What is wrong with this? Its the source it self but why?

Read full topic

By updating postion you mean?

updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Right? Cause that doesen’t work

item.title: Czar source help! Person's position doesent get updated on my screen
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“elitescouter, post:1, topic:180066”]Ok so I know someone has to have a fix for this!

The source won’t update players position meaning, if the person EX: swings across the monkey bars on my screen it shows him by me on 1 side but on his screen he’s really on the other side… WTF???

Same thing with ::xteletome (It’s not a command problem) I can’t use ::xteletome unless I log in after the person so meaning the person has to be on the server b4 me in order for me to use that command on him.

Another thing like I said if the person is let’s say 10 squares away from me and still visible to me and I use the ::xteletome command on them. On their screen they are on top of me but on my screen I still see them 10 squares away.

Please if someone can help me!!![/quote]

Make sure their positions are updated after the teleport.
And the other question was asked last night.

Read full topic
